page.title: 09Holidays in Tongue
page.content: Lundies Adventure Centre occupies what was once the old manse and is open from April till October. There is canoeing, and hillwakingin the beautiful surrounding country, as well as pony trekking. The pony trekking costs Â£6.50 for two hours and treks can be up to Castle Varrich or perhaps round the Kyle. Apart from Lundies there are two hotels and many of the local ladies open their homes for bed & breakfast for visitors in the summer months. Most of the visitors come for peace and quietness and clean mountain air.Most are interested in hill walking. bird watching, flower spot ting or fishing. Many have holiday homes in the area and come very year for several weeks.
